W. B. Dolan
dcterms:description: The Microsoft Research Video Description (MSVD) corpus consists of descriptions for a collection of 1,970 video clips, each depicting a single action or simple event, with an average of 43 sentences per video.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Research Video Description (MSVD)

dcterms:description: The COCO 2014 image description dataset consists of over 120,000 images, with approximately 82,000 images for training and 40,000 for testing, frequently used for image captioning tasks.
dcterms:title: COCO 2014 image description dataset
